job_purpose: To provide .NET and SiteCore development and support services to HIA, contributing to the organization's vision of representing the Australian residential building industry and maintaining high standards.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop high-quality code leveraging existing code libraries, patterns, and architectural techniques
Design and develop functional web applications based on usability
Configuration and creation of new SiteCore assets
Participate in sprint planning and technical design
Maintain currency of skill set through training and seminars
Ensure all development is done in accordance with IT processes
required_qualifications: Experience in SiteCore and .NET framework administration
Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and in a team

Conversant with various technologies including .NET Framework, WCF, SOAP, C#, ASP.Net, VB.Net, Web forms, REST/WEB API, jQuery, Javascript, SOAP, HTML, CSS, XML, XSLT, T-SQL, DEVops, Dynamics CRM, .NET Core MVC, Entity Framework/nHibernate ORM
company_details: HIA has been representing the Australian residential building industry for over seventy-five years, focusing on creating real change, providing quality services at the lowest possible cost, and maintaining high standards. Employees enjoy attractive benefits including annual leave purchase options, salary sacrifice arrangements, study assistance programs, paid maternity leave, and group insurance cover.
